text: Giulio Angioni (28 October 1939 - 12 January 2017) was an Italian writer and anthropologist. He was known for his works Le fiamme di Toledo and Assandira . He was born in Guasila, Sardinia. Angioni died on 12 January 2017 in Cagliari, Sardinia, aged 77.Addio all'antropologo e scrittore Giulio Angioni ==References== ==Other websites== *OPAC SBN *Giulio Angioni *Sardegna Digital Library *Wuz *Club Dante Category:1939 births Category:2017 deaths Category:20th-century Italian writers Category:European anthropologists Category:People from Sardinia
title: Giulio Angioni
